t:
I scratched my scalp to relieve a constant itching.



The neurosurgeon didn't expect me to wake up so soon,
as my fingers smashed through grey matter...
c:
The brain surgery didn't go very well.



Collab & write a horror story tonight. #midnighthorror

The most interesting setting for horror is the character being alone and something inexplicable happening. Example: I looked at the mirror and saw myself blink. Mirrors are a good element to add as mirrors bring more possibilities. Light and sound could be other elements that could be used. #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba





#brain #surgery #doctor #operation #greymatter #death





PS: I waited for YQ to give a horror prompt, had been doing this for so long.
